entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, White Rock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:40 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: White Rock 09:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: 3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: 0.1°C
Wind: W 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of hail this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except southeast 40 gusting to 60 near the water early this morning. Wind becoming light near noon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 70 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of hail early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
